p: When comparing different plants, Clevenger hydrodistillation of bay laurel leaves consistently resulted in the highest oil yield (from 1.95 mL oil/100 g dry plant for HD-REP to 2.05 mL oil/100 g dry plant for HD-REX and HD-REPCX), followed by sage (from 1.45 mL oil/100 g dry plant for HD-RE to 1.55 mL oil/100 g dry plant for HD-REX and HD-REPCX) and rosemary (from 0.7 mL oil/100 g dry plant for HD-REC to 0.8 mL oil/100 g dry plant for HD-RE).
